name: @lairddougal3833
text: We have needed to address questions of ownership and wealth for a long time. What obligations, if any, does a firm of lawyers, say, the partners of which buy an AI to replace a third of their staff, have. Do they just take more profit? What of taxes? And what of the rights of the AI. True AI would constitute an entity. Does that entity have an independent existence or is it simply a slave? It long past due for us to really unpick the nature of wealth and the sustainability of a consumer capitalist society. Instead of addressing these questions we just sleepwalk towards a greater slavery. This has to change.
